name: Upstairs Hallway
longDesc:
You are in the UPSTAIRS HALLWAY.
There is a STAIRCASE leading downstairs and you can see the entrance to the ATTIC in the ceiling.
In this hallway, there are doors to a LARGE BEDROOM which belongs to your parents,
a SMALL BEDROOM which belongs to you, and a BATHROOM shared by everyone.
description:
You are in the UPSTAIRS HALLWAY.
There are stairs leading to the DOWNSTAIRS HALLWAY and a thread leading to the ATTIC.
There are doors to a LARGE BEDROOM,
a SMALL BEDROOM, and a BATHROOM.

recycling bin.name: recycling bin
recycling bin.description: The recycling bin is filled to the top with aluminum seltzer cans.
recycling bin.discoveryStatement: You'll need one an ALUMINUM CAN for the shrink ray.

purse.name: purse
purse.description:
Your mom's purse is gigantic. If you jump in you might get lost!
Better not take anything or you might get caught.

exercise ball.name: exercise ball
exercise ball.description: The giant blue exercise ball that your dad uses instead of a desk chair. It is very bouncy

aluminum can.name: aluminum can
aluminum can.description: Partially crushed seltzer can from a brand you cannot pronounce.
